      • correctCandyPosition

        public static boolean correctCandyPosition(AbstractCandy[] candyList,
                                           AbstractCandy candy,
                                           Vertex exitDoor)
        Check if the position of the Candy we want to put is not already used by another Candy, or the player or the exit door.
        Parameters:
        candyList - The array containing all Candies.
        candy - The Candy to be tested.
        exitDoor - The vertex of the exit door.
        Returns:
        True, if there is no other Candy, or player or exit door at the same position, otherwise return false.
